response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it's a piece of history and a testament to craftsmanship that transcends time. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,500,000, but considering my desire to see it go to someone who truly appreciates its significance, I am offering it to you at this exclusive price. Would you be interested in discussing the details further? I am open to negotiating terms that could benefit both of us. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 2,000,000}
